titles.title: Wild and Scenic Rivers Act Amendment Act of 1999

To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to ensure congressional involvement in the process by which rivers that are designated as wild, scenic, or recreational rivers by an act of the legislature of the State or States through which they flow may be included in the national wild and scenic rivers system, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 9/14/1999--Introduced. Wild and Scenic Rivers Act Amendment Act of 1999 - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to revise the process of including rivers designated as wild, scenic, or recreational by States in the national wild and scenic rivers system to require authorization for their inclusion by Act of Congress.
